name: git-clone-mirror-vsts-task
description: A straightforward cross-platform utility to mirror a Git repository to another location
author: Travis Kosarek

inputs.name: gitMirrorRepositoryUrl
inputs.label: Git Repository to Mirror to
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of a Git repository to mirror to. Example: https://github.com/traviskosarek/traviskosarek-com.git

inputs.name: gitMirrorPersonalAccessToken
inputs.label: Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Personal Access token that grants access to push to a Git repository
